Reviews.Title: “Affordable and Clean”
Reviews.Author: LakeGirl1729
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at the Spinning Wheel many times and have never been disappointed. It's affordable and clean and has a great location only a couple blocks off the "strip", so it's quiet, yet convenient. The staff is very pleasant, from the front desk to housekeeping and maintenance staff. We always recommend the Spinning Wheel to our friends. We've also stayed once at the sister motel next door, Twelve Oaks, and it's very nice also.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Review”
Reviews.Author: jenng66
Reviews.Content: We always stay at Twelve Oaks , it was a last minute Branson weekend, Twelve Oaks was booked, but the owner said , we own both give them a ring, and luckily they had a great king a size bed available, it was super clean and I love the prices, and we can always take the back roads to get to both hotels and you have to stay on main 65 highway and I love that . This hotel was really nice and affordable.I will stay there again, if Twelve Oaks is booked. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: TheCoops99
Reviews.Content: We had a little hiccup in our weekend stay in Branson, and ended up needing a one night stay on the strip at the last minute. We originally tried to get a room at Twelve Oaks next door, but they did not have a king room available. Being the extremely nice and helpful people they are, they found us a room at their sister property next door, Spinning Wheel. We ended up with the King Jacuzzi room, and it was WONDERFUL! Clean, spacious, great view, and the shower/tub....oh my goodness, it was fabulous! The staff was friendly, the place is clean and well maintained, and the price cannot be beat. Although we did not use it, the pool was a good size and very clean looking. The Spinning Wheel Inn made my birthday weekend in Branson better than it already was! We will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “We keep coming back”
Reviews.Author: Stephen R
Reviews.Content: When we discovered the Spinning Wheel, we were actually trying to get into the hotel next door, then found they're owned by the same people. When we stayed the first time, we knew we'd found a good place to keep coming back to. The price is right, and they are people who are well versed in American English. No heavy accented foreigners here. We've always had a pleasant experience each time we've stayed at Spinning Wheel.

Reviews.Title: “Will definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Janet S
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights, with 2 rooms. We were celebrating our 25th anniversary so my husband and I stayed in a king room with jacuzzi tub and the kids stayed in the double queen room next to us. We enjoyed the fridge in the room which kept the drinks we'd brought along very cold. The pool was bigger than a lot of hotels we'd stayed at in the past and was cleaned daily just like the rooms. We loved the continental breakfast where my daughter loved the apple butter, another loved the peanut butter, and my son raved about the donuts so much that he wished for them when we got home. All of the staff I came into contact with were very friendly and pleasant. The only complaint I heard was from my son about the shower head being a bit low in their room, but ours was quite a bit higher than theirs and worked wonderfully. Everything was so clean! I heard some footsteps from upstairs, but only while I was awake. It never woke me, and I'm a light sleeper. The place was quiet as it wasn't on the strip, but was near the strip. Overall I was impressed and will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for family & budget!”
Reviews.Author: Melissa V
Reviews.Content: We visit Branson every year for vacation with our children. We have always stayed at a hotel on the strip but decided this year to try something new. So glad we did! The room was very clean, our kids loved the pool and most importantly the staff was very friendly! One other thing that was great was we couldn't hear our neighbors (which meant they couldn't hear us either - this is always a worry when you have children). Their were other families with children staying near us and we never heard anything through the walls. On the way home when I asked the kids where they want to stay next year they said the Spinning Wheel. Don't forget to print the coupon off their website for additional savings. Looking forward to seeing you next July Spinning Wheel!! :)

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: kschray
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for 4 nights this week, and I was very pleased with our stay. The room was exceptionally clean, the staff was friendly, and we got a great rate. The swimming pool was very nice, and the location was great. It was very close to the strip and the alternate routes, which made getting around easy. I would definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends, and would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Best-Kept Secret in Branson”
Reviews.Author: OldMama38
Reviews.Content: Our family, (dh, ds, dm, and me) went to Branson for 4 nights and 5 days. My husband found the Spinning Wheel Inn from a simple search through Google. It was a great rate: 54.95 for 2 double beds. One word to describe the place: CLEAN! The bed linens were always clean, the towels were taken daily, the pool (and area) were extra clean. I was so impressed. A shout-out to the hostess for help in our emergency. My dm woke up on the 2nd morning with a case of gout and was in terrific pain. I called the front desk for information on a pharmacy that delivered. (Note to Branson and other places of interest: if you have lots of elderly and children visiting your city, encourage a pharmacy in your city to DELIVER MEDS) She gave me the name of a pharmacy that she believed would deliver meds. I called dm's primary health provider's emergency number and was able to give him the phone number of Family Pharmacy in Branson, which was willing to deliver on a Saturday when it normally only delivered on Monday through Friday. By 1:30 p.m., Family Pharmacy had delivered the meds, and my dm was on the way to recovery. The only negatives that I can possibly make is the need for microwaves in rooms (there are refridgerators) and new mattresses. Honestly, those are not hills to die on, though. We will be back again if they are still in business. :)

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: Tarah H
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay at the Spinning Wheel Inn this last weekend! The rooms were spacious and super clean! Breakfast was just what we need...donuts were delicious :) The staff was very friendly and helpful with knowledge of the town. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Once again! Super!”
Reviews.Author: wanderkat21
Reviews.Content: My Branson go-to hotel is Spinning Wheel. I would not go anywhere else. Close to the Strip but not too close. Quiet (mostly, see below). Friendly people. And clean! I had booked my usual King-on-the-second floor. Once we arrived however, I asked to be moved to the lower floor. We got a King which had the bonus of a deep Jacuzzi-style tub for one. In some places, when you book a certain room, the staff take care to "extra-clean" the room. I am pleased to say our alternate room was perfectly clean. Now, this is not a fancy place. It is older, and the carpeting and furniture show some age. Our bedding was clean and fresh, and the heating/cooling worked well. The room had a bit of a "old hotel smell" but not bad. Nice-sized fridge, clean coffee maker in-room, and everything worked. If you book a room on the bottom floor, you WILL hear occasional footsteps as people pass over-head on the upper walkway. I did not hear the people in the room above us. I am a light sleeper and had no trouble getting a decent night's shut-eye. The noisiest part of the morning was all the local bird-song. This hotel is nestled close to some woods and the cardinals, etc were pleasant. Let me emphasize, this place is clean. The housekeepers do a terrific job. This is a quiet place for people who want a quiet place to sleep and relax after a busy day in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: Blueskies125
Reviews.Content: A friend recommended this hotel; we were a little leary, because the price was so reasonable, and so often a low price means low quality. We were pleasantly surprised, however, that there were many nice features. We had a king bed, which meant that there was room for a night stand on only one side of the bed, since the room was on the smaller side. But there was an area for hanging clothes, a large TV, a small round table with chairs, a coffee maker, and a mini-refrigerator. The sink was in the sleeping part of the room, which is not our favorite, but it worked out. We didn't have any problems with the shower or water pressure. The breakfast was nice - we also enjoyed the peanut butter. Everything was clean and tidy. There is also a small park between this property and another, with a place for little ones to swing and play. This hotel is far enough from busy Hwy 76 to be peaceful.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet location but near everything”
Reviews.Author: travelon1
Reviews.Content: I got this hotel on Hotwire for a super low rate. The location is near Hwy 76 (the strip) but not on it so it was fairly quite with no car noise. It is nothing fancy but was clean and well maintained. The free breakfast consisted of bread, bagels and donuts plus beverages. I ran across a couple of negatives. First of all the shower head was only five feet tall and half the water was coming out of the spigot instead of the shower head so I had to crouch my five foot nine frame to rinse my hair. Second, the plumbing is not insulated well so I could hear my neighbor turn on the sink and shower. Third, the mattress was cheap and hard and stained. No heavenly bed here. The experience was not terrible but I would not rave about it either.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Zach D
Reviews.Content: This was a great hotel, staff was friendly and rooms were clean. I saw one review about the water pressure, but we had plenty, I think water pressure is something the city takes care of LOL not that hotel! So much have been a water issue :) But water was hot, the A/C units are a little dated but it cooled the room down enough and for the price you pay, keep in mind your not staying at the hilton but it was quiet and clean and family run.

Reviews.Title: “Clean room and great service”
Reviews.Author: ColoradoKidsRV
Reviews.Content: Staff went out of their to help us when they were full one of the nights we wanted to stay. They called a motel next door and we were able to stay close to friends. The next night we stayed here at Spinning Wheel and found the room clean and convenient to local shopping and musical shows on the west end of Hwy, 76.

Reviews.Title: “clean, good price, friendly people”
Reviews.Author: mcboyd
Reviews.Content: nice quiet place to stay on the west end of town. we enjoyed the pool. there were plenty of towels in the room which was nice and clean. it is not fancy but all we needed was a place to sleep. there were cheaper places to stay but we did enjoy this place. breakfast was just cereal and donuts... the orange juice was not good, watered down or something....

Reviews.Title: “Won't stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: WellingtonFamilyof4
Reviews.Content: Water pressure wasn't very good and made horrible noise when coming out. Air conditioning not very cold most places freeze you out not here it barely cooled the room had it looked at said it was fine. NO IT WASN"T! Pillows needed replaced very lumpy. The only thing good about the room it was clean!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely pleased”
Reviews.Author: tatkins88
Reviews.Content: This was the cleanest place that we've ever stayed. My sister and her husband were with us and they were very happy with their room also. We couldn't ask for a better location. The manager was very nice and pleasant. This is where we will stay the next time that we visit Branson. With their economical prices, it made our vacation possible. THANKS!!

Reviews.Title: “CLEAN, VERY Clean, best value for my dollar in years”
Reviews.Author: gordonna
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one night at the end of our trip in Branson, I gambled on Hotwire to see what I could find. AND WE WON!!! Clean and quiet and a perfect location. They even have a private park, with a bar-b-que, picnic table, playground, horseshoes. I wanted to get a cheap room cause we planned out going out and exploring the town and seeing shows. SO we got a 2 star, but as clean as a five star. After I saw the place, I wished I would have booked more nights at the hotel. My husband and I are not big on 2 star hotels and I was a little scared, but once I saw the room my fears were gone. The room was clean, very clean, furniture in good condition, nothing was falling apart or stained. The room had a little plant on the table which helped the room feel cozy. The pool was clean and at least 6 foot. The breakfast very minimal toast pastries and coffee, but there are plenty of brocheres available while eating. Also, breakfast is served in the check in lobby. When we go back, We plan to stay in 201, that would be the best room ask for it, it's like a little apartment. We have stayed in many hotels over our years of travel and we have never written a review, but this place deserved one. This hotel was clean and thats what hotel room has to be. BEST value for your dollar, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Get room 201, apartment sized room”
Reviews.Author: jpw711
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one night in Room 201, an oversized room which appears to have been at one time the owners quarters. The room includes a huge walk in closet, separate toilet room, jetted tub with a fancy shower (10 spray heads), double vanity, make up counter. and towel cabinet. It has a king size bed that is firm, personally I like a firm bed, so this was great for me. The pillows were typical motel pillows, not to great. This room had house carpet, not typical hotel room commercial grade carpet and a 27" tube type tv. Cleaning staff was very friendly, the front desk staff at check in could have been friendlier, she wasn't rude, just not talkative at all. This place was quiet, the pool was clean and good size. The room was $64/nt with a $5 coupon printable off the internet. Peeked into a normal room, they looked good too. The owners have another motel next door with a private park, playground, bbq grills, etc between. Would stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: TraceT69
Reviews.Content: My inlaws stayed there many times and my parents at the sister hotel. I am generally a very picky or as friends say a hotel snob....this was not someplace I thought I would stay, but it was great! We actually stayed there 4 times last year. I have stayed at a couple other hotels in the area and they don' t compare. Don't miss this great value.

Reviews.Title: “SUPER STAY!”
Reviews.Author: mrsmichellelong
Reviews.Content: What a SUPER Place! One of the best places we have ever stayed! My husband and I stayed for 4 days in branson to celebrate our anniversary and loved every moment! The staff was incredible and the rooms and grounds were very clean! The breakfast was perfect...the donuts were great :) Everything was great! We recommend this place to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Great economy room for families!”
Reviews.Author: byrdnest
Reviews.Content: We were able to reserve a large room with three double beds to accomodate our family of five. It was economical and practical. The room was clean and the hotel was in a great location. There are no bells or whistles...however, the room did have a microwave and fridge. Just don't count on the breakfast. It consisted of pastries that you carry back to your room from the tiny lobby. This is a great hotel for large families on a budget!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful and pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: SuzyTraveler66
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Spining wheel Inn because it was reccommended by our friends and they were right...it was just what we were looking for..a very clean motel at a great price. We stayed in thier Jacuzzi Suite and it was better than we expected. All the staff was friendly, helpful and went out of thier way to see if they could make our stay even better. We would definintly reccommend the Spinning Wheel Inn to everyone. We love it !!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, pleasant room for a good price”
Reviews.Author: #1Nanaof2
Reviews.Content: We have gone to Branson twice a year for the last several years and always stay at The Spinning Wheel. We know the room will always be clean, the management is friendly and helpful and the price can't be beat. We like the fact that it is situated off of the 76 Strip so it is quiet. Their breakfast consists only of doughnuts, coffee and juice but that is OK with us since we aren't big breakfast eaters anyway. While this hotel is nothing fancy, it is a clean place to sleep and relax after a hard day of shopping in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean and very friendly.”
Reviews.Author: szq1120
Reviews.Content: My family stayed at this hotel for a week and we were very pleased. It is not on the main street but is easy to get to. They have a very light breakfast in the lobby, the rooms had plenty of space and everything was very clean. Very nicely priced for a family hotel.

Reviews.Title: “hardest bed we ever slept on”
Reviews.Author: lanjones
Reviews.Content: We and another couple booked this hotel for three nights because of the other reviews on here. We got here the first night & both of us didn't sleep at all. We immediately checked out the next morning & found another hotel called Oak Grove Inn for a much cheaper rate ( no breakfast, but made up for it in cost). The Oak Grove Inn had comfortable beds & extremely clean rooms. Also had a fridge & microwave in the rooms. I would not recommend the Spinning Wheel at all.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: SouthernBlossom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 5 nights in July and will most definitely choose The Spinning Wheel again. We loved everything about the place. It was VERY clean...staff was great...nice pool area and best of all was the PRICE of the rooms. Also you can go to their website and print a discount coupon. You won't be dissapointed if you stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet, friendly”
Reviews.Author: wanderkat21
Reviews.Content: Clean, clean, clean. This property is my absolute favorite in Branson. Our room was smallish, with one King bed, and basic furnishings. But it was comfortable for the two of us. The bathroom had a normal sized tub (jetted) and shower. It was all very clean. The TV and remote worked. We paid for a mini-fridge, which also worked. I have been to other places where this was not the case. So the Spinning Wheel gets a big "thank you" for delivering on a clean, comfortable room. I did not use the pool because I was too busy at Silver Dollar City. But I did check it out-clean, cool water. The area was tidy. The continental breakfast was coffee, tea, juices, doughnuts, toast, and instant oatmeal. It made for a nice, light starter. The staff were extra friendly, polite and nice. The front desk manager and housekeepers really do take pride in their work. My favorite part of the stay was the little private park next to the Inn. It was a great place to unwind and sit among the trees. There are a few picnic tables as well. This is NOT a rowdy, party scene place. And did I mention how clean it was?

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean motel for the money”
Reviews.Author: kansasgal80
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Spinning Wheel over Labor day weekend 08'. This is a nice clean hotel for the money. The front desk guys were nice, pool was nice and clean. No complaints. Only thing is that they advertise breakfast on their sign but its just donuts...they were fresh donuts but thats all they offered! :o)

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: SanditeMom
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just spent the weekend in Branson and stayed at the Spinning Wheel. We had not stayed there before, but had stayed next door at Twelve Oaks. We found the Spinning Wheel VERY clean, the staff VERY friendly and the stay was wonderful. The pool was spakling and we had a very relaxing time enjoying it. The room was surprisingly large and we had everything we needed. We go to Branson at least twice a year and I will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “nice and clean”
Reviews.Author: clean-concern
Reviews.Content: We just return from Branson and stayed at the Spinning Wheel Inn for five nights . And was very pleased nothing fancy but clean which is my main concern and that it was. The only thing I had a problem with is the con. breakfast could use some improvement and I needed a ironing board in the room.Other than that it was great.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant experience staying at the Spinning Wheel Inn”
Reviews.Author: okiegirl71
Reviews.Content: I had a very pleasant time staying at the Spinning Wheel Inn. The staff was extremely friendly and the rooms were very clean. The pool was pristine and the location was very convienient to all of the Branson attractions. We enjoyed the continental breakfast provided with our stay. My family and I stayed two nights and paid $51 (apx per night after using our coupon that we printed from the Spinning Wheel web site) I will stay at the Spinning Wheel Inn the next time I am in Branson and will recomend that anyone else do the same. I have paid double that amount for rooms that did not meet my expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful value - extremely clean”
Reviews.Author: davab
Reviews.Content: I loved the Spinning Wheel Inn. My mother, daughter and I spent just one night but it was excellent. The front desk staff was very helpful. The room was a double with 2 queen beds. It was not fancy but perfect for our purpose which was a nice, safe, clean place to sleep. I couldn't have asked for more for less than $50 per night. Be sure to check the website for the discount coupon. I recommend the Spinning Wheel Inn to anyone who's looking for an affordable, extremely clean lodging experience in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Inexpensive, Quiet and Very Clean!”
Reviews.Author: SummerlinCyn
Reviews.Content: This was our first time staying at the Spinning Wheel Inn. I found them through MySpace and was glad that I did. The hotel was exceptionally clean, the staff was very nice and helpful and the price was under $50.00 a night. The room was cleaned to perfection every morning, the beds were comfortable and it's only about one minute or less to get to the strip. We will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “thank you”
Reviews.Author: gmrohr
Reviews.Content: motel was very clean and neat 1 block from the strip in branson. very quiet area, rooms were the cleanest we have ever encountered. the room was larger than our double room at the radisson that cost $115 per night. pool area was nice and the water was crystal clear. we have been going to branson forthe last 5 years and have never stayed anywhere that was a better value than the spinning wheel. its a great place for a great clean room that will not eat into your vacation funds!!!! wish we would have found this place 5yrs earlier

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Very Clean, Highly Recommended!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I booked this room after reading some of the reviews on the net about the Spinning Wheel Inn and I must say it lived up to the reviews. We paid $92.00 for two nights including tax and a $5.00 off coupon for a family of four. This was for a non-smoking room with two queen beds. The room was very clean!! Nothing fancy, 19" TV with Cable, Alarm Clock, and Hair Dryer, but what do you expect for the price, and did I mention how clean it was. They do serve coffee, juice and cake doughnuts in the morning that you can take back to your room; they don't have a sit down breakfast area. The pool was nice sized and clean as well. If you want a budget room that is clean, then this is the place for you! If you want a lot of extras look somewhere else.

HotelInfo.Name: Spinning Wheel Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 235 Schaefer Drive, Branson, MO 65616
